context_of_use: This use case allows users to view and download available reports for analysis or offline use.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to analyze data offline
power user: wants to access reports for efficient data handling
description: This use case enables users to view and download reports for analysis or offline use.
triggering_event: User requests to view or download reports.
preconditions: Reports are available for viewing and downloading
assumptions: Users have the necessary permissions to view and download reports
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to view available reports.
The system shall allow users to download reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on report types available for viewing and downloading.
main_flow: 2. customer → System allows customer to select a report to view.
3. customer → System displays the selected report.
4. power user → System allows power user to select a report to download.
5. power user → System initiates download of the selected report.
